sentences.sContent: Her doctor made a diagnosis of appendicitis.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her doctor made a diagnosis of appendicitis.
sentences.sCn: 她的医生作出阑尾炎的诊断。

sentences.sContent: The doctor has cured numerous people of appendicitis .
sentences.sContent_eng: The doctor has cured numerous people of appendicitis .
sentences.sCn: 这个医生治愈了很多人的阑尾炎。

sentences.sContent: He and Farkash met when he had appendicitis and she was a nurse, and they were married in 1970 or 1971 and have seven children.
sentences.sContent_eng: He and Farkash met when he had appendicitis and she was a nurse, and they were married in 1970 or 1971 and have seven children.
sentences.sCn: 卡扎菲与索菲亚的相识，是因为他得了阑尾炎，而那时，她是一名护士。 两人在1970或1971年结婚，膝下育有七名儿女。

trans.tranOther: an illness in which your  appendix  swells and causes pain
